channel.title: Need a trustworthy dev team for Ganjadub [317]
channel.description:
[317] Ganjadub Beta 1 [source: Thrillscape]
This is actually the first server ive had running since i was about 11. I am now 17, smarter, and going to give it a try. I need a small dev team (for now).
I don't want anything major completed right now. Remember, its in Beta 1.
[b]What/Who i need:[/b]
[ul][li]Somebody on the forum side with me.[/li] [li]Atleast 2-3 dev's on the server side with me (receive special in-game moderator, if you play)[/li] [li]I DONT NEED A HOST, im hosting this from my house, with very high-speeds. 24/7 in less than 2 weeks!![/li] [li]Dedicated dev's willing to stay by my side for this entire project[/li][/ul]
If interested, reply below with your experience in java and rsps.. PM me, etc.. We will discuss details upon acceptance.
Thank you,
Ganjdub (Chris)

item.title: Need a trustworthy dev team for Ganjadub [317]
item.dc:creator: @0ll13 0ll13
item.description:
@0ll13 wrote:

hi, my name is ollie and ive been working with java on rsps’ for about 4 years on and off, and ive made several of my own servers in the past which have been fairly successful averaging around 40-80 players. If your interested in me helping you then just PM me

Read full topic
